name: Hello Bubble Tikin Edition
description:
Play the fun Hello Bubble Tikin Edition game for FREE and enjoy 1000+ exciting and colorful levels! Help the sweet kitten to pop all the bubbles!
Fun boosts

- Colorful Candy Ball - pop 7 bubbles in a row and the candy ball will clear a path!
- Multicolored Bubble Bomb- drop 10 bubbles or more and the colorful bomb will explode the surrounding bubbles.
